description: Main entry point and core widget hierarchy for a Flutter-based job application app. Sets up providers, themes, navigation, and page scaffolds.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectRoot
classes.description: Root widget that initializes global providers for state management.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectApp
classes.description: Main app widget that sets themes, localization, and home screen.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Handles onboarding/authentication flow and routes to main shell.

classes.name: OnboardingScreen
classes.description: Intro screen for new users with sign-in/register button.

classes.name: AuthScreen
classes.description: Stub for sign-in/register process, currently a demo placeholder.

classes.name: TabbedMainShell
classes.description: Main navigation shell with tabs for core features.

classes.name: JobsScreen
classes.description: Displays list of jobs fetched from backend.

classes.name: JobDetailsScreen
classes.description: Displays detailed info of a selected job and allows application.

classes.name: MessagesScreen
classes.description: Lists message threads, navigates to chat details.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: Displays user profile info with basic editing options.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: Stub for app settings and preferences.

classes.name: CompanyDetailsScreen
classes.description: Page for company info when job's company tile is tapped.

classes.name: ChatDetailScreen
classes.description: Real messaging interface, loads/sends messages for a thread.

classes.name: ChatBubble
classes.description: Visual widget for individual chat messages.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for various widgets.

methods.name: fetchJobs
methods.description: Fetches job list from backend (called in init).

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message in a thread.
